summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2258, for the improvement of Hillman Place, from East 60th Street to East 65th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, together with necessary surface and sub-drains, under Ordinance No. 23094 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
